constituencies.ingressSingleElection: The candidates and parties are divided into constituencies. You can only vote for those in your constituency.
constituencies.ingressMultipleElections: The candidates and parties are divided into constituencies. Select a constituency for each election.

elections.ingress: Select the elections for which you want to find candidates or parties.

frontPage.ingress: With this application you can compare candidates and parties based on their opinions, parties and other data.
frontPage.startButton: Find the Best Candidates and Parties!

info.content: Read more about the elections below.

intro.ingress: This application will help you find the {candidatePlural} and {partyPlural} that best match your opinions in the elections.

list.results: See the {candidatePlural} and {partyPlural} that best agree with you

intro.title: Let’s start!

maintenance.content:
We're very sorry, the Election Compass is currently unavailable due to maintenance. It should be back in use shortly, so please try again later.

Don’t worry if you were just in the middle of answering. You can continue from where you left off, when you come back.

privacy.content: The privacy and data collection of the application is outlined below.

dataConsentIntro.popup: Could we collect your data completely anonymously for research purposes and to improve the application? We do not use cookies, and the data cannot be connected to you.

ingress.browse: These are the {candidatePlural} and {partyPlural} standing in these elections, ordered by election symbol or name. You can use the filters to narrow them down.
ingress.results: These are the {candidatePlural} and {partyPlural} standing in these elections. The best matches are first on the list. To narrow down the results, you can also use the filters.

results.multipleElections: Select below first which election’s {candidatePlural} and {partyPlural} you want to see and then whether you want to see {candidatePlural} or {partyPlural} .

survey.info: Would you like to help improve Election Compasses? Open the survey in a new window and fill it out now or when it suits you.
survey.popupInfo: The survey opens in a new window. You can fill it out immediately or when it suits you.
survey.popupTitle: Would you like to help improve Election Compasses?
survey.title: Take Part in User Survey
